title: Dems look to move impeachment, debate needle: Heidi Przybyla and Ben Kamisar
description: NBC's Heidi Przybyla and Ben Kamisar join Chuck Todd to discuss Adam Schiff's closing arguments in Thursday's impeachment inquiry hearing and Wednesday's 2020 debate.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
content:encoded: NBC's Heidi Przybyla and Ben Kamisar join Chuck Todd to discuss Adam Schiff's closing arguments in Thursday's impeachment inquiry hearing and Wednesday's 2020 debate.

itunes:summary: Impeachment hearings are wrapped ... for this week at least.
